name: conversion-blocks/accordion
title: Accordion / FAQ
description: Organize content in expandable accordion sections

default.question: What is this?
default.answer: This is an accordion block that lets you organize content in expandable sections.

default.question: How do I use it?
default.answer: Click on any section to expand or collapse the content.

default.question: Can I customize it?
default.answer: Yes! You can add, remove, and edit sections in the block editor.
